meanings.definition: People: individuals forming a community or group
meanings.sent1: The peepuls in our neighborhood always come together for community events.
meanings.sent2: The peepuls in the town hall meeting discussed important issues affecting their community.
meanings.sent3: The peepuls at the bake sale were so excited, they started a cupcake war!
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the peepuls flowed like a river through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The peepuls gathered around the bonfire, their laughter filling the night air.

meanings.definition: People: the members of a particular nation, community, or ethnic group
meanings.sent1: The peepuls of this country celebrate their independence every year.
meanings.sent2: The peepuls of the tribe have unique traditions passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The peepuls at the cultural festival showcased their traditional dances with pride.
meanings.sent4: In the melting pot of the city, peepuls from all backgrounds come together.
meanings.sent5: The peepuls of the village welcomed the travelers with open arms.

meanings.definition: People: human beings in general, considered collectively
meanings.sent1: It is important to remember that peepuls have different beliefs and perspectives.
meanings.sent2: The peepuls of the world share a common desire for peace and happiness.
meanings.sent3: The peepuls in the park enjoyed a sunny day of picnicking and laughter.
meanings.sent4: As night fell, the peepuls of the city retreated to their homes, tired but content.
meanings.sent5: The peepuls of the planet must work together to protect the environment for future generations.
